001package org.jfree.chart.plot;
002
003
004import org.jfree.chart.text.TextAnchor;
005import java.awt.Point;
006import org.jfree.chart.axis.ValueAxis;
007import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
008import org.jfree.chart.api.RectangleEdge;
009import org.jfree.chart.axis.AxisState;
010import java.awt.Graphics2D;
011import java.io.Serializable;
012
013public class PolarPlotProduct implements Serializable, Cloneable {
014        private double angleOffset;
015        private boolean counterClockwise;
016        private int margin;
017
018        public double getAngleOffset() {
019                return angleOffset;
020        }
021
022        public void setAngleOffset2(double angleOffset) {
023                this.angleOffset = angleOffset;
024        }
025
026        public boolean getCounterClockwise() {
027                return counterClockwise;
028        }
029
030        public void setCounterClockwise(boolean counterClockwise) {
031                this.counterClockwise = counterClockwise;
032        }
033
034        public int getMargin() {
035                return margin;
036        }
037
038        public void setMargin2(int margin) {
039                this.margin = margin;
040        }
041
042        /**
043        * Calculate the text position for the given degrees.
044        * @param angleDegrees   the angle in degrees.
045        * @return  The optimal text anchor.
046        */
047        public TextAnchor calculateTextAnchor(double angleDegrees) {
048                TextAnchor ta = TextAnchor.CENTER;
049                double offset = this.angleOffset;
050                while (offset < 0.0) {
051                        offset += 360.0;
052                }
053                double normalizedAngle = (((this.counterClockwise ? -1 : 1) * angleDegrees) + offset) % 360;
054                while (this.counterClockwise && (normalizedAngle < 0.0)) {
055                        normalizedAngle += 360.0;
056                }
057                if (normalizedAngle == 0.0) {
058                        ta = TextAnchor.CENTER_LEFT;
059                } else if (normalizedAngle > 0.0 && normalizedAngle < 90.0) {
060                        ta = TextAnchor.TOP_LEFT;
061                } else if (normalizedAngle == 90.0) {
062                        ta = TextAnchor.TOP_CENTER;
063                } else if (normalizedAngle > 90.0 && normalizedAngle < 180.0) {
064                        ta = TextAnchor.TOP_RIGHT;
065                } else if (normalizedAngle == 180) {
066                        ta = TextAnchor.CENTER_RIGHT;
067                } else if (normalizedAngle > 180.0 && normalizedAngle < 270.0) {
068                        ta = TextAnchor.BOTTOM_RIGHT;
069                } else if (normalizedAngle == 270) {
070                        ta = TextAnchor.BOTTOM_CENTER;
071                } else if (normalizedAngle > 270.0 && normalizedAngle < 360.0) {
072                        ta = TextAnchor.BOTTOM_LEFT;
073                }
074                return ta;
075        }
076
077        /**
078        * Sets the offset that is used for all angles and sends a {@link PlotChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners. This is useful to let 0 degrees be at the north, east, south or west side of the chart.
079        * @param offset  The offset
080        */
081        public void setAngleOffset(double offset, PolarPlot polarPlot) {
082                this.angleOffset = offset;
083                polarPlot.fireChangeEvent();
084        }
085
086        /**
087        * Translates a (theta, radius) pair into Java2D coordinates.  If {@code  radius}  is less than the lower bound of the axis, then this method returns the centre point.
088        * @param angleDegrees   the angle in degrees.
089        * @param radius   the radius.
090        * @param axis   the axis.
091        * @param dataArea   the data area.
092        * @return  A point in Java2D space.
093        */
094        public Point translateToJava2D(double angleDegrees, double radius, ValueAxis axis, Rectangle2D dataArea) {
095                if (counterClockwise) {
096                        angleDegrees = -angleDegrees;
097                }
098                double radians = Math.toRadians(angleDegrees + this.angleOffset);
099                double minx = dataArea.getMinX() + this.margin;
100                double maxx = dataArea.getMaxX() - this.margin;
101                double miny = dataArea.getMinY() + this.margin;
102                double maxy = dataArea.getMaxY() - this.margin;
103                double halfWidth = (maxx - minx) / 2.0;
104                double halfHeight = (maxy - miny) / 2.0;
105                double midX = minx + halfWidth;
106                double midY = miny + halfHeight;
107                double l = Math.min(halfWidth, halfHeight);
108                Rectangle2D quadrant = new Rectangle2D.Double(midX, midY, l, l);
109                double axisMin = axis.getLowerBound();
110                double adjustedRadius = Math.max(radius, axisMin);
111                double length = axis.valueToJava2D(adjustedRadius, quadrant, RectangleEdge.BOTTOM) - midX;
112                float x = (float) (midX + Math.cos(radians) * length);
113                float y = (float) (midY + Math.sin(radians) * length);
114                int ix = Math.round(x);
115                int iy = Math.round(y);
116                Point p = new Point(ix, iy);
117                return p;
118        }
119
120        /**
121        * Set the margin around the plot area and sends a {@link PlotChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
122        * @param margin  The new margin in pixels.
123        */
124        public void setMargin(int margin, PolarPlot polarPlot) {
125                this.margin = margin;
126                polarPlot.fireChangeEvent();
127        }
128
129        /**
130        * Draws the axis with the specified index.
131        * @param axis   the axis.
132        * @param location   the axis location.
133        * @param g2   the graphics target.
134        * @param plotArea   the plot area.
135        * @return  The axis state.
136        */
137        public AxisState drawAxis(ValueAxis axis, PolarAxisLocation location, Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D plotArea) {
138                double centerX = plotArea.getCenterX();
139                double centerY = plotArea.getCenterY();
140                double r = Math.min(plotArea.getWidth() / 2.0, plotArea.getHeight() / 2.0) - this.margin;
141                double x = centerX - r;
142                double y = centerY - r;
143                Rectangle2D dataArea = null;
144                AxisState result = null;
145                if (location == PolarAxisLocation.NORTH_RIGHT) {
146                        dataArea = new Rectangle2D.Double(x, y, r, r);
147                        result = axis.draw(g2, centerX, plotArea, dataArea, RectangleEdge.RIGHT, null);
148                } else if (location == PolarAxisLocation.NORTH_LEFT) {
149                        dataArea = new Rectangle2D.Double(centerX, y, r, r);
150                        result = axis.draw(g2, centerX, plotArea, dataArea, RectangleEdge.LEFT, null);
151                } else if (location == PolarAxisLocation.SOUTH_LEFT) {
152                        dataArea = new Rectangle2D.Double(centerX, centerY, r, r);
153                        result = axis.draw(g2, centerX, plotArea, dataArea, RectangleEdge.LEFT, null);
154                } else if (location == PolarAxisLocation.SOUTH_RIGHT) {
155                        dataArea = new Rectangle2D.Double(x, centerY, r, r);
156                        result = axis.draw(g2, centerX, plotArea, dataArea, RectangleEdge.RIGHT, null);
157                } else if (location == PolarAxisLocation.EAST_ABOVE) {
158                        dataArea = new Rectangle2D.Double(centerX, centerY, r, r);
159                        result = axis.draw(g2, centerY, plotArea, dataArea, RectangleEdge.TOP, null);
160                } else if (location == PolarAxisLocation.EAST_BELOW) {
161                        dataArea = new Rectangle2D.Double(centerX, y, r, r);
162                        result = axis.draw(g2, centerY, plotArea, dataArea, RectangleEdge.BOTTOM, null);
163                } else if (location == PolarAxisLocation.WEST_ABOVE) {
164                        dataArea = new Rectangle2D.Double(x, centerY, r, r);
165                        result = axis.draw(g2, centerY, plotArea, dataArea, RectangleEdge.TOP, null);
166                } else if (location == PolarAxisLocation.WEST_BELOW) {
167                        dataArea = new Rectangle2D.Double(x, y, r, r);
168                        result = axis.draw(g2, centerY, plotArea, dataArea, RectangleEdge.BOTTOM, null);
169                }
170                return result;
171        }
172
173        public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
174                return (PolarPlotProduct) super.clone();
175        }
176}
